columns.name: cul_id
columns.comment: Unique identifier

columns.name: cul_timestamp
columns.comment: Timestamp of CheckUser action

columns.name: cul_user
columns.comment: User who performed the action

columns.name: cul_user_text
columns.comment: User who performed the action

columns.name: cul_reason
columns.comment: Reason given

columns.name: cul_reason_id
columns.comment: Reason for the check stored as a comment_id. Default of 0 is used to indicate using cul_reason.

columns.name: cul_reason_plaintext_id
columns.comment: Reason for the check with wikitext removed stored as a comment_id. Default of 0 is used to indicate using cul_reason.

columns.name: cul_type
columns.comment: String indicating the type of query, may be: 'useredits', 'userips', 'ipedits', 'ipusers', 'ipedits-xff', 'ipusers-xff' or 'investigate' if the check was performed from Special:Investigate

columns.name: cul_target_id
columns.comment: Integer target, interpretation depends on cul_type For username targets, this is the user_id

columns.name: cul_target_text
columns.comment: Text target, interpretation depends on cul_type

columns.name: cul_target_hex
columns.comment: If the target was an IP address, this contains the hexadecimal form of the IP

columns.name: cul_range_start
columns.comment: If the target was an IP range, this field contain the start, in hex form

columns.name: cul_range_end
columns.comment: If the target was an IP range, this field contain the end, in hex form
